org.radarcns.management.repository

Interface SubjectRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Subject,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Subject,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Subject>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Subject,java.lang.Long>

    public interface SubjectRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,java.lang.Long>
    Spring Data JPA repository for the Subject entity.
